original: @170a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @170a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: stu ti aa nu sham sa /
analyzed: stu ti aa nu sham sa /
translated: Stuti-anusamsa

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bstod pa'i phan yon //🔽'di dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: bstod pa'i phan yon // 'di dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: The Benefits of Praise🔽These are the vast, true qualities

original: yang dag yon tan rgya chen yin //
analyzed: yang dag yon tan rgya chen yin //
translated: Of all the buddhas.

original: de dag lan cig brjod pas kyang //
analyzed: de dag lan cig brjod pas kyang //
translated: By merely reciting them once,

original: gang phyir sngags pas thams cad 'grub //
analyzed: gang phyir sngags pas thams cad 'grub //
translated: The mantra practitioner will accomplish everything.

original: bstod ba'i rgyal po 'di dag gis //
analyzed: bstod ba'i rgyal po 'di dag gis //
translated: It is said that by these kings of praises,🔽The thus-gone ones are pleased, abiding for eons and more,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byed de bskal par gnas dang lhag pa dang // dngos grub rgya chen ster bar gsungs //🔽blta bas chog mi shes pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byed de bskal par gnas dang lhag pa dang // dngos grub rgya chen ster bar gsungs // blta bas chog mi shes pa yi //
translated: Granting vast spiritual powers.

original: bdag nyid sku yang ston par mdzad //
analyzed: bdag nyid sku yang ston par mdzad //
translated: They display their own bodies,🔽Which are delightful to behold.

original: rnam par snang mdzad mgon po che //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mgon po che //
translated: The great protector Vairocana,

original: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung //
translated: Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava,

original: dag pa'i rgyal ba snang mtha' yas //
analyzed: dag pa'i rgyal ba snang mtha' yas //
translated: The pure conqueror Amitabha,

original: don yod grub rgyal thams cad kyis //🔽gser 'gyur dang ni bcud kyis len //🔽de nyid mchog kyang rab tu sbyin //
analyzed: don yod grub rgyal thams cad kyis // gser 'gyur dang ni bcud kyis len // de nyid mchog kyang rab tu sbyin //
translated: And all the victorious Amoghasiddhi🔽Grant the supreme state of alchemy🔽And the attainment of the elixir.

original: dngos grub dgar gyur rnams yangs shing //
analyzed: dngos grub dgar gyur rnams yangs shing //
translated: The vast and delightful spiritual powers

original: ma lus don rnams phun tshogs pa //
analyzed: ma lus don rnams phun tshogs pa //
translated: And the fulfillment of all aims without exception,

original: bsam pa kun yang rdzogs byed pa'i //
analyzed: bsam pa kun yang rdzogs byed pa'i //
translated: And the fulfillment of all wishes,

original: yid la sems pa ster bar mdzad //🔽shes rab che dang stobs shugs rnams //
analyzed: yid la sems pa ster bar mdzad // shes rab che dang stobs shugs rnams //
translated: And the bestowal of mental thoughts,

original: mchog tu dge ba snang bar mdzad //
analyzed: mchog tu dge ba snang bar mdzad //
translated: And the supreme virtue of great wisdom and strength🔽Is what is illuminated.

original: ces pa bstod pa'i phan yon dang bcas pa 'di nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan las gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces pa bstod pa'i phan yon dang bcas pa 'di nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan las gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This praise, together with its benefits, is taught in the Vajra Mandala Ornament Mahāyoga Tantra.

original: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: Translated by the monk Tsültrim Gyaltsen.
